mapper.sql: id, serviceId, siteId, objType, objId, megIcc, megUmc, mel, reserve1, reserve2, localMepId, remoteMepId, lpbOutTime, targetMacAdd, lck, lm, lmCycle, lmReserve1, dm, dmCycle, dmReserve1, reserve3, reserve4, reserve5, cv, cvCycle, cvReserve1, aps, ssm, sccTest, fdi, ringEnable, ringCycle, ringTestWay, offLineTestTLV, ringTLVLength, ringTLVInfo, tstEnable, tstCycle, tstTLVType, tstTLVLength, lspTc, csfEnable, pwTc, megid, ltEXP, ltTTL, ltEnable, lbTTL, vlanEnable, outVlanValue, tpId, sourceMac, endMac, oamEnable,dmlength
mapper.update: update oammepinfo set objId=#{objId} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from oammepinfo where objType = #{objType} and serviceId = #{serviceId}
mapper.select: select * from oamMepInfo where siteId = #{siteId} and objType = #{objType}
select * from oamMepInfo where megIcc = #{0} and megUmc = #{1}
mapper.update: update oamMepInfo set objId=#{objId} where siteId = #{siteId} and serviceId = #{serviceId} and objType = #{objtype}
mapper.select: select * from oamMepInfo where objId = #{0} and objType = #{1}
select * from oamMepInfo where objId = #{objId} and objType = #{objType} and lck = #{lck}
mapper.update: update oamMepInfo set objId = #{0} where objType =#{2} and objId in #{1}
mapper.insert: insert into oamMepInfo(objType,objId,localMepId,remoteMepId,mel, cv,cvCycle,cvReserve1,reserve1,reserve2, lm,lmCycle,lmReserve1,dm,dmCycle, dmReserve1,lck,lpbOutTime,targetMacAdd,reserve3, reserve4,reserve5,aps,ssm,sccTest, megIcc,megUmc,fdi,siteId,serviceId, ringEnable,ringCycle,ringTestWay,offLineTestTLV,ringTLVLength, ringTLVInfo,tstEnable,tstCycle,tstTLVType,tstTLVLength, lspTc,pwTc,megId,csfEnable,ltEXP, ltTTL,ltEnable,lbTTL, vlanEnable, outVlanValue, tpId, sourceMac, endMac,oamEnable,dmlength) values( #{objType},#{objId},#{localMepId},#{remoteMepId},#{mel}, #{cv},#{cvCycle},#{cvReserve1},#{reserve1},#{reserve2}, #{lm},#{lmCycle},#{lmReserve1},#{dm},#{dmCycle}, #{dmReserve1},#{lck},#{lpbOutTime},#{targetMacAdd},#{reserve3}, #{reserve4},#{reserve5},#{aps},#{ssm},#{sccTest}, #{megIcc},#{megUmc},#{fdi},#{siteId},#{serviceId}, #{ringEnable},#{ringCycle},#{ringTestWay},#{offLineTestTLV},#{ringTLVLength}, #{ringTLVInfo},#{tstEnable},#{tstCycle},#{tstTLVType},#{tstTLVLength}, #{lspTc},#{pwTc},#{megId},#{csfEnable},#{ltEXP}, #{ltTTL},#{ltEnable},#{lbTTL},#{vlanEnable},#{outVlanValue}, #{tpId},#{sourceMac},#{endMac},#{oamEnable},#{dmlength} )
mapper.update:
update oamMepInfo set megIcc = #{megIcc} , megUmc = #{megUmc}, localMepId = #{localMepId}, remoteMepId = #{remoteMepId} , mel = #{mel} , reserve1 = #{reserve1},reserve2 = #{reserve2}, lm = #{lm} , lmCycle = #{lmCycle} , lmReserve1 = #{lmReserve1}, dm = #{dm} , dmCycle = #{dmCycle} , dmReserve1 = #{dmReserve1}, lck = #{lck},lpbOutTime = #{lpbOutTime}, targetMacAdd = #{targetMacAdd}, reserve3 = #{reserve3}, reserve4 = #{reserve4}, reserve5 = #{reserve5} , cv = #{cv} , cvCycle = #{cvCycle} , cvReserve1 = #{cvReserve1} , aps = #{aps},ssm = #{ssm} , sccTest = #{sccTest} , fdi = #{fdi} , ringEnable= #{ringEnable} , ringCycle = #{ringCycle} , ringTestWay = #{ringTestWay} , offLineTestTLV = #{offLineTestTLV} , ringTLVLength = #{ringTLVLength} , ringTLVInfo = #{ringTLVInfo} ,tstEnable = #{tstEnable} , tstCycle = #{tstCycle} , tstTLVType= #{tstTLVType} , tstTLVLength = #{tstTLVLength} ,lspTc = #{lspTc} , pwTc=#{pwTc} ,csfEnable=#{csfEnable} ,megId=#{megId} , ltEXP=#{ltEXP} ,ltTTL=#{ltTTL} ,ltEnable=#{ltEnable} ,lbTTL=#{lbTTL}, vlanEnable=#{vlanEnable}, outVlanValue=#{outVlanValue}, tpId=#{tpId}, sourceMac=#{sourceMac}, endMac=#{endMac} ,oamEnable=#{oamEnable},dmlength=#{dmlength} where objType = #{objType} and objId = #{objId} and serviceId = #{serviceId}
and siteId = #{siteId}
